name: BEATris
description: BEATris is a puzzle-based rhythm game. Feel the rhythm as you bash the blocks with the power of music! Enjoy various levels with unique soundtracks. Make and share your own level on Steam Workshop.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Only supports 16:9 ratio resolutions Storage: 200 MB available space
